<script setup>
import { defineProps, ref } from 'vue';

const props = defineProps({
  imageSrc: {
    type: String,
    required: true,
  },
  hotspots: {
    type: Array,
    required: true,
  },
});

const popupVisible = ref(false);
const popupData = ref({
  name: '',
  description: '',
});

const openPopup = (hotspot) => {
  // Set the popup data based on the clicked hotspot
  popupData.value.name = hotspot.name || '';
  popupData.value.description = hotspot.description || '';
  // Show the popup
  popupVisible.value = true;
};

const saveHotspot = () => {
  // Handle saving hotspot information, you can emit an event or perform any action here
  console.log('Saving hotspot:', popupData.value);
  // Close the popup after saving
  popupVisible.value = false;
};
</script>
<style scoped>
.image-hotspots {
  position: relative;
}

.uploaded-image {
  max-width: 100%;
}

.popup {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  background-color: white;
  padding: 20px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 5px;
  z-index: 1000;
}
</style>
